Not Human

My new short story, Not Human, is available now, including the first two chapters of my upcoming book, SEER. Subscribe to my email list for early access!

Lisa is the first person to have her consciousness duplicated. A promising science experiment becomes an ethical dilemma, and Lisa finds herself questioning what it means to be human.
